text: you know the thing about retail is
what's old is New Again constantly we're
constantly Reinventing ourselves we
start with the same core value
propositions that have been retail
tenants right from the beginning right
from the creation of the industry you
serve the customer you look for the best
price and the best quality but still
there's ways in which technology and
Innovation have changed this everything
from Omni Channel where customers can
buy online and pick up the store to
create a visualization where you can
almost draw and create your own product
and finally customers that can really
feel like they're understood by
retailers with Hyper personalization and
advanced analytics so it's the same
business with new tools to Delight the
customer even more
